hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Ice Cavern#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #lakeside lab diving experiment# rewards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Heart Container# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Heart Container#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path of #time#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple GS Boss Key Loop

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #3# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #the Giant's Knife# and #the Biggoron Sword#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #Dampé's Grave#.

ToT (Left).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #an Ocarina#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.
